name: Greenergy International Limited
goal: Our mission is to supply road fuel by developing long-term customer partnerships by being the fuel provider with the; lowest cost; highest reliability; best systems and control; easiest people to deal with; and most transparency.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Greenergy take a keen interest in any EU policies that are based on reducing energy / GHG emissions in the transport sector, including legislation such as; the Renewable Energy Directive and Fuel Quality Directive.

Furthermore, we take interest in other policies that effect our operation including, the Council Directive (2009/119/EC) that imposes an obligation on Member States to maintain minimum stocks of crude oil / petroleum products.
